title: FS/FT: Pat McCauley Old Mill SGC 30..SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Pat McCauley Old Mill SGC 30..SOLD
posts.post_content: Hello im trying to sell or trade this card.The price is 58.50 Delivered.Paypal Gift or add 3%.Looking to trade with cash towards a SGC 20-50 HOF I dont have already.First pm,email,or post gets it.Thanks.Jason

Revelle sold...Wiliing to trade the McCauley for any T210-2's I dont have or any T206 HOF'er in SGC 20-50.I need the following:E.Collins,Duffy,Evers,McGraw,Tinker,Waddell.Willing to add cash to the trade for the right offer.Thanks
